properties.Name: CustomerRelatedPartyAuthenticationMethod
properties.Description: A method that can be used to authenticate a customer related party with a particular relationship to the party. Note that not all identification, security questions or biometrics may be considered suitable or sufficient for related party authentication.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: PartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: CustomerPartyRelationshipTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a customer relationship type.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp for which the associated customer - party relationship is valid or in-effect.

Columns.Name: CustomerRelatedPartyAuthenticationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Related Party Authentication Method.

Columns.Name: CustomerRelatedPartyAuthenticationMethodPeriodStartTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period start timestamp that the customer related party is associated with the authentication method.

Columns.Name: CustomerRelatedPartyAuthenticationMethodPeriodEndTimestamp
Columns.Description: The period end timestamp that the customer related party is associated with the authentication method.

Columns.Name: AuthenticationMethodId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Authentication Method.

Columns.Name: CustomerRelatedPartyAuthenticationMethodNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the customer related party authentication method.

Columns.Name: SecurityQuestionNumber
Columns.Description: The number associated with the order in which the question is asked for the purpose of identification.

Columns.Name: IdentificationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the identification.

Columns.Name: BiometricTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a biometric type.

Columns.Name: Timestamp
Columns.Description: The timestamp that the associated information is reported, recorded or effective as-of.

Properties.Description: A method that can be used to authenticate a customer related party with a particular relationship to the party. Note that not all identification, security questions or biometrics may be considered suitable or sufficient for related party authentication.
